Content:: Newspaper in Ukrainian (Ukrainian: Газета по-українськи) is an illustrated newspaper based in Kyiv covering politics, economics, culture, sport, arts, and other different topics and aimed at the Ukrainian-language reader. It is published chiefly in Ukrainian but quotes in Russian are not translated. The newspaper has its own website - Gazeta.ua, where archives and additional information that is not included in the printed newspaper may be found. It has also editorial offices in Lviv, Vinnytsia, Poltava, and Cherkasy. The owner of the newspaper is New Information Publishing Group Ltd. which also owns the magazine "Krayina" ("The Country").
